title: How to find a freelance content writer here - Quora

response.answer_text: I am interested in writing your articles what are you looking for I charge per project or daily rate Let's discuss My background I do technical writing and proposals for all my projects across blue chip companies delivering multi million dollar projects Let me know what you looking to do
You can message me with more information on your requirements. I am a Content Writer with over 10 years of experience in content writing, editing and digital marketing.
